typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> InpEmployeeExcel
InpEmployeeExcel derive({Process Date} = currentDate()) ~> AddDateField
AddDateField sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> OutJsonFile
